data.name: Candy Bar
data.detailed_description:
Candy bar is a dating simulator with a set of mini-games.

You ended up in a new city thanks to a candy store inherited from a wealthy relative. Meet the locals, invite them to your new store and treat them to candies. But be prepared that they all have their own special character, and everyone needs a different approach.

Features

  • Your own candy shop
  • Change of day and night in the city
  • Atmospheric music
  • Meditative gameplay
  • Mini games for developing relationships
  • 4 unique girls

=============================================================================================================================


=============================================================================================================================

Izumi - cute blue-haired sportswoman. It will be difficult to lure her into the store: she is on a strict diet, because she dreams of performing at the Olympics in the future. But now he is preparing for a less significant swimming competition.

=============================================================================================================================


=============================================================================================================================

Akane - red-haired fashion lover with a heavy character. She is used to life in a big city: her texts are published in a fashion magazine, she visits expensive restaurants and spends a lot of time in beauty salons.

=============================================================================================================================


=============================================================================================================================

Naomi - lover of musical instruments. She dreams of writing her own songs and going on a world tour.

=============================================================================================================================


=============================================================================================================================

Shizuka - tall shy girl, lover of literature. He spends all his free time in the library. She is writing her book, how can you help her. Or, conversely, spoil her book on purpose.

=============================================================================================================================


=============================================================================================================================

Final party - invite all the girls to your shop and treat them with candies at the same time!

=============================================================================================================================

data.short_description: Candy bar is a dating simulator with a set of mini-games. You ended up in a new city thanks to a candy store inherited from a wealthy relative. Meet the locals, invite them to your new store and treat them to candies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 820M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 820M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Sound Card: any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Sound Card: any
